description: Kazuto is Yukine`s dead brother. He was a delinquent, but was kind to his sister. He died in an accident escorting his friends home. Yukine and her delinquent friends refer that Tomoya`s personality is the same as her brother. His death is the reason how Yukine gets close with the delinquents, who were Kazuto`s friends.
name: Miyazawa Kazuto
